word_mean: 斑疹伤寒：一组由节肢动物传播、由立克次体所致急性传染病，临床表现和病理改变关系密切，但在某些证候和病情的轻重及死亡率上则不尽同，皆以剧烈头痛、发冷、高热、木僵以及斑性、斑丘疹性、瘀点性或丘疹水泡性皮疹为其特征。按其临床和流行病学情况可分为以下三类：流行性(典型或虱传型)斑疹伤寒及其复发型(Brill-Zinsser二氏病)和鼠型(地方性或蚤传型)斑疹伤寒
同typhus fever。在英语国家，常单以typhus表示流行性斑疹伤寒，而在欧洲几种语言中，则指伤寒

sentence.Network_en: The hospital ward was fumigated after the outbreak of typhus.
sentence.Network_cn: 发现斑疹伤寒以后,医院的病房进行了烟熏消毒.

sentence.Network_en: A typhus epidemic struck in the winter of 1919–20.
sentence.Network_cn: 1919至1920年的冬天斑疹伤寒症流行.

sentence.Network_en: Zosia had caught typhus from one of the students and had gone away for ever.
sentence.Network_cn: 卓希雅从一个学生那里传染上了伤寒,永远地离开了人世.

...o;顺带一提，“粉丝”的意大利语是“tifoso”。源自斑疹伤寒（typhus）这个词。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek tuphos 'smoke, stupor', from tuphein 'to smoke'

entry.def: Typhus is a serious infectious disease that produces spots on the skin, a high fever, and a severe headache.

means.word_mean: 1. rickettsial disease transmitted by body lice and characterized by skin rash and high fever

auth_sentence.content: Typhus supervening on a gunshot wound.

auth_sentence.content: Then a typhus epidemic swept the country, killing two to three million more.

auth_sentence.content: One rickettsial disease, epidemic typhus, has been for centuries a great scourge of mankind.
